packagingVersion.description: The version of the packaging format. Please do not use this version. It is only here for backwards compatibility. We recommend you use the latest version.

version.description: The version of the package. We recommend that you use semantic versions. See http://semver.org/ for more details on semantic versions.

scm.description: Source control management. This is generally the URL of the project GitHub repository.

maintainer.description: The maintainer of the package. This is generally an email address.

website.description: URL to the website of a project. This is generally the URL of the project GitHub repository.

description.description: Detailed description of what the package does.

framework.description: True if this package installs a new Mesos framework.

preInstallNotes.description: Pre installation notes that would be useful to the user of this package.

postInstallNotes.description: Post installation notes that would be useful to the user of this package.

tags.description: A list of keywords associated with the package.

selected.description: Flag indicating if the package is selected in search results

name.description: The name of the license. For example one of [Apache License Version 2.0 | MIT License | BSD License | Proprietary]

url.description: The URL where the license can be accessed
